analysis.key_quote: Converting positions to Schedule F will most likely create an echelon of additional political appointees (in practice of not in name), who will be less responsive to the legal requirements of their positions and harder to fire for misbehavior.
analysis.rationale: The comment expresses opposition to the proposed rule by highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential erosion of legal protections for employees, indicating a preference for maintaining a merit-based system and due process rights.
